with you is better than being by yourself
If you have a friend, he can help you to do your work.
If you fall down, he can help you get up again.
But if you fall down when you are alone, it will be difficult for you,
because there will be no one to help you stand up.
Similarly, if two people sleep together,
they can keep each other warm.

When a poor young man becomes king
A young man who is poor but wise is a better person than a foolish old king who refuses to pay attention when people try to give him good advice.
It is possible for a young man like that to succeed and some day become king, even if his parents were poor or even if he was in prison some of the time.
